title: A quest on finding the ancient scrolls of Run... where is the lore please ty
body:
Where can I find the updated lores plus this new one and, for future need, the Bilgewater event? (Or any other event for that matter) You should work a bit on your website clarity plz

I mean, look at the site, http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/, 

**GAME INFO** -  Doesn't come off as lore folder to me.
**NEWS** - News.
**ESPORTS** - Esports.
**Boards**, **Community**, **Merchandise**, **Support** etc. 

c: rito common

If you want people to invest into more than the actual game, (e.g lore), make it more clear, like you do with the game itself

**Runeterra - Explore the World** is needed there. And if possible make it _cool and interesting_ to navigate.

replies.body:
Indeed, I don't think it's actually up on the EUW page right now!  I'll link you to the new materials below:

[Shadow and Fortune Homepage](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/shadow-and-fortune/index.html)

[The Reckong (story from Bilgewater: Burning Tides)](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/bilgewater/#story-1)

Happy reading!

Thank you for taking the time! But still, it's not like someone who's exploring League website will stumble upon it easily (I think :|) -- The ones who know about it can always google 'bilgewater event' but someone who's walking around may not find it ever!

I'm just giving feedback on it because I think it's kinda awkward

But regardless, ty c:
For the champions, all the updates lore is on their info pages on the website
Thanks! :| kinda obvious I guess, and I go there often to check ability ap/ad ratios
